Lyric:
[by:Kayais]

[00:22.20]People, do you understand me now?
[00:27.42]Sometimes I feel a little mad
[00:32.91]Don't you know no one alive can always be an angel?
[00:38.21]When things go wrong, I seem a little sad
[00:42.78]
[00:43.72]But I'm just a soul whose intentions are good
[00:49.11]Oh Lord, please don't let me be misunderstood
[00:57.46]
[01:05.38]You know sometimes, I'm so carefree
[01:10.37]With a joy that's hard to hide
[01:15.46]And sometimes seems that all I have is worry
[01:21.24]And then you're bound to see my other side
[01:25.23]
[01:26.54]But I'm just a soul whose intentions are good
[01:32.36]Oh Lord, please don't let me be misunderstood
[01:39.13]
[01:46.84]If I seem edgy, I want you to know
[01:52.35]That I never mean to take it out on you
[01:57.70]Life has its problems and I get more than my share
[02:03.74]But that's one thing I never mean to do
[02:07.34]I don't mean it
[02:08.47]
[02:09.51]People, don't you know I'm only human?
[02:15.05]Don't you know I have thoughts like any one?
[02:19.62]But sometimes I find myself alone regretting
[02:25.76]Some little thing, some foolish thing
[02:28.53]That I have done
[02:29.91]
[02:30.38]But I'm just a soul whose intentions are good
[02:36.42]Oh Lord, please don't let me be misunderstood
[02:44.41]Don't let me be misunderstood
[02:47.49]
[02:49.74]I'm just someone whose intentions are good
[02:54.75]Don't let me be misunderstood
[03:00.00]Don't let me be misunderstood
[03:06.35]
